About Me!

Hello! I'm Alex Nisperos, a 29-year-old creative explorer from Oakland, CA, currently studying animation and graphic design at Laney College. I'm driven by a deep passion for visual communication, whether it's through the dynamic movement of animation or the thoughtful construction of graphic design. I'm excited about the journey of transforming ideas into compelling visual realities.
